Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back FJ$250 RESORT CREDIT INCLUDES 1 FREE NIGHT View gallery / Back Intercon Fiji Aerial View Intercon Fiji Club Pool Intercon Fiji Family Pool Intercon Fiji Golf Course Intercon Fiji Adults only Infinity Pool Fiji InterContinental Fiji Golf Resort & Spa &vert; Return flights • 5 Nights • Transfers • Breakfast Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions If you’ve been searching for a Fijian holiday experience that encompasses fine cuisine, international standards of luxury, a stunning beach and the level of service you would expect from a 5-star resort, you’ll find it here. The InterContinental Fiji Golf Resort & Spa is on picturesque Natadola Beach, which is undoubtedly the best beach on Fiji’s mainland. InterContinental Fiji Golf Resort & Spa participate in the Loloma Hour, dubbed "The world's first happy hour for the environment". InterContinental is offering beach clean up initiative. For more information about Loloma Hour and what it offers click HERE . Club InterContinental Treat yourself to a Club InterContinental experience by staying in one of the Club InterContinental guest rooms to indulge, relax and be spoilt by the extra benefits View more View less 5 nights + flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 2159 per person share twin Flying with Fiji Airways FJ$250 RESORT CREDIT INCLUDES 1 FREE NIGHT Enquire now Sale Period : until 10 Nov 25 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Value class airfares flying Fiji Airways from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Nadi 5 nights accommodation Return Nadi Airport transfers Buffet breakfast daily Includes 1 FREE night FJ$250 resort credit FREE Introduction to Scuba Diving Pool Splash, mini putting green, nightly live entertainment FREE Wi-Fi Club InterContinental Benefits Include: Daily breakfast in a choice of 3 venues (A la carte in the Club Lounge, Full buffet in Sanasana Restaurant or Adult Only in Navo Restaurant) FREE Club Lounge benefits - fruits, juices and/or pastries, 2 hours of Sunset Cocktails and Canapes, all day beverages (non-alcoholic), afternoon High Tea FREE daily replenishable non-alcoholic mini bar FREE services from the Itokani Butler /Private Holiday Planners Exclusive access to the Club InterContinental Lounge and private infinity pool Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland 2 Double Garden View Balcony The room is adorned with a soothing blend of neutral tones and dark wood. Relax on the daybed on your spacious balcony in the Garden View Room, or unwind to the gentle sound of the wind rustling through the trees while you enjoy the outdoor freestanding Cleopatra tub, thoughtfully positioned behind a privacy screen. Auckland 5 night package from $2159 per person share twin Additional nights from $325 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Feb - 28 Feb 26, 02 Mar - 21 Mar 26 Auckland 5 night package from $2499 per person share twin Additional nights from $409 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Jun - 08 Jun 26, 14 Jun - 26 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 17 Sep 26 Wellington 5 night package from $2179 per person share twin Additional nights from $325 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 02 Feb - 28 Feb 26, 02 Mar - 21 Mar 26 Wellington 5 night package from $2519 per person share twin Additional nights from $409 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Jun - 08 Jun 26, 15 Jun - 25 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 17 Sep 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $2259 per person share twin Additional nights from $325 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Feb - 28 Feb 26, 02 Mar - 21 Mar 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $2369 per person share twin Additional nights from $375 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 26 Apr - 02 May 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $2519 per person share twin Additional nights from $409 per person share twin Kids Fly from $449 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Jun - 08 Jun 26, 14 Jun - 25 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 24 Sep 26 1 Bedroom Suite Club Lounge Access Take in panoramic views of a vibrant canopy of tropical trees and foliage from the privacy of your one-bedroom, 115-square-meter Club InterContinental suite, perched atop a forested hill, offering a secluded retreat above the rest of the resort. As a guest, you'll have access to the exclusive Club InterContinental Lounge, where you can enjoy daily adults-only sunset cocktails and canapés. Auckland 5 night package from $3679 per person share twin Additional nights from $705 per person share twin Travel 01 Feb - 21 Mar 26 Auckland 5 night package from $3949 per person share twin Additional nights from $769 per person share twin Travel 26 Apr - 02 May 26, 20 May - 28 May 26 Auckland 5 night package from $4169 per person share twin Additional nights from $825 per person share twin Travel 01 Jun - 08 Jun 26, 14 Jun - 26 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 17 Sep 26 Wellington 5 night package from $3699 per person share twin Additional nights from $705 per person share twin Travel 02 Feb - 21 Mar 26 Wellington 5 night package from $3969 per person share twin Additional nights from $769 per person share twin Travel 27 Apr - 02 May 26, 21 May - 28 May 26 Wellington 5 night package from $4189 per person share twin Additional nights from $825 per person share twin Travel 01 Jun - 08 Jun 26, 15 Jun - 25 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 17 Sep 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $3779 per person share twin Additional nights from $705 per person share twin Travel 01 Feb - 21 Mar 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $3969 per person share twin Additional nights from $769 per person share twin Travel 26 Apr - 02 May 26, 21 May - 28 May 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $4189 per person share twin Additional nights from $825 per person share twin Travel 01 Jun - 08 Jun 26, 14 Jun - 25 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 24 Sep 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Fiji sightseeing optional add-ons Malamala Beach Club – Full Day Tour Fiji’s only island beach club, just 25 minutes from Port Denarau is the perfect option to add onto your mainland stay. Day pass club entry includes return Denarau Marina transfers and allows you to enjoy the white sand beaches, pristine lagoon waters, a resort style infinity edge pool and beachside cabanas (surcharged). Delicious island cuisine and beverages are available, along with an island massage spa menu (additional charges apply). Half Day Tours are available – ask us for more information. Includes: Hotel transfers, return vessel transfers from Port Denarau to Malamala, free WiFi, on island towel service, use of non-motorised watersports equipment. Note: No discounts for children. Operates: Daily Duration: 7 hours Price from $149 per adult, $149 per child (3+ yrs) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Sigatoka River Safari Sigatoka River Safari is Fiji’s must -do experience, offering all guests a uniquely Fijian half day adventure into the heart and soul of Fiji. The jet boat and village safari tour includes a welcome kava ceremony, guided village tour, lunch, entertainment and jet boat thrill ride. Includes: Hotel transfers, village visit, jetboat tour and lunch Operates : Mon-Sat Duration: 4.5 hours Price from $279 per adult, $135 per child (4-15 years) Travel : 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Off Road Cave Safari Fiji’s only Off-Road Cave Safari offers a half day of adventure deep into the valleys of Viti Levu. The tour is rich in history and you’ll experience Fiji’s largest cave system – Naihehe Cave, originally home to the Nabuavatu village during the tribal warfare days. The tour takes you on a journey to how the cave was used as defence and to seek refuge from enemies. Includes: Hotel transfers, BBQ lunch, snacks Operates: Mon-Sat Duration: 4.5 hours Price from $255 per adult, $129 per child (4-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 South Sea Sailing - Sabre This full-day sailing experience on the 78-foot sailing catamaran SABRE, will cruise through the Mamanuca Islands, where onboard you can shelter under shaded canopies, seating booths, day beds or relax on one of many bean bags. During the day, you’ll stop to snorkel, or swim at the tropical reef or sand cay. Gourmet buffet lunch is served along with a complimentary selection of local beer and wine for 2 hours (served from lunchtime onwards), soft drinks, and mineral water (served all day). It’s an fantastic tour to add on to your mainland resort package. Includes: Hotel transfers, catamaran sailing experience, use of snorkelling gear, buffet lunch, complimentary selection of local beer and wine for 2 hours (served from lunchtime onwards) complimentary soft drinks and bottled mineral water (served all day) Operates: Daily Duration: 7 hours Price from $205 per adult, $105 per child (5-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Cloud 9 Fiji Here’s an unreal, ridiculously relaxing way to round off your mainland stay – a bar and gourmet pizzeria floating in the middle of the ocean. Sun decks, hanging chairs, day beds and clear turquoise water all around. Out of this world! Includes a FJ$60 credit. Includes: Hotel transfers, return vessel transfers from Port Denarau to Cloud9, F$60 credit for onboard food and drinks. Operates: Daily Duration: 6 hours Price from $269 per adult, $245 per child (10-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Captain Cook - Island & Reef Day Sail A must-do Fijian, barefoot Island experience on your own private tropical island beach. Set sail for the spectacular Kadavu Lailai Private Beach in the Mamanucas. Enjoy the pristine white sandy beach and acres of coral gardens where you can spend the day snorkelling, paddle boarding, kayaking or playing beach volleyball with the crew. Join a nature walk and/or guided marine tour with our resident Marine Biologists and take part in the ‘Build a Reef’ coral restoration program. There is also the Captains Kids Club to keep the little ones engaged while you spend some ‘me’ time relaxing or snorkelling. Enjoy a fresh tropical BBQ buffet lunch with an ice-cold beer, house wine or juice and enjoy listening to the soulful voices of the Fijian crew as they serenade you while you eat and take in the spectacular views. Operates: Daily Duration: 10am-5pm Price from $245 per adult, $155 per child (3-15 years) Travel: 01 Jun 25-31 Mar 26 River Tubing Fiji Locally owned family business provides an authentic experience with greater insights into locals way of life. Experience Fiji along the Navua River on this full day tour. Take a longboat ride up the scenic Navua River offering views of cascading waterfalls, tropical rainforest and island scenery. Visit the small village of Sambata where you will see the daily way of life. After the village it's time for a refreshing waterfall swim followed by lunch and depending on the conditions at the river, tubing can be a relaxing way to spend an afternoon or it can be an energising adventure. Includes: Hotel transfers, lunch Price from $185 per adult, $95 per child (5-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Sale ends 10 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 13 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Value class flying Fiji Airways to Nadi from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Flight departures from New Zealand are based on: from Auckland daily, from Wellington on a Monday, Thursday and Saturday and from Christchurch on a Monday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday • Travel dates specified are subject to departure days from NZ and are subject to change based on availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary • Any value adds or meal/beverage packages that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash • If adding a Meal /Beverage package it must be purchased for all adults for the full duration of your accommodation • Min/max stays apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Availability during school holiday & peak travel periods may be limited • Advertised prices are per person share twin based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding • Where Kids eat free, this is from selected restaurants, from selected menus at set times • Kids club age restrictions apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 01 Nov 24, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
